TopicTitle: The Mun Base that hasn't made it....Yet! Continues

Articles.Content: I started a post on the spacecraft exchange and should have started it here, my mission is to get this large Mun Base on the Mun in one trip, so far I made a few changes because I didn't have enough fuel to land when I arrived at the Mun. I plan to post this as a Challenge with a storyline to make it fun. Here is my latest achievement (Arrived but no Landing....Yet!)

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72968-The-Mun-Base-that-hasn-t-made-it-Yet%21

Here is a link to the beginning of my Adventure!

"Mun base on the Mun"... lol

I would like to see some of your work, do you have space stations orbiting Eeloo?

"Mun base on the Mun"... lol

Well, it wouldn't make sense to put it on Minmus, now, would it?
